def.name: Routes of Administration for Opioid Antagonists

def.name: Encounter with Opioid Administration Outside of Operating Room

"Encounter with Opioid Administration Outside of Operating Room"

expression.name: Encounter with Opioid Administration Outside of Operating Room

def.name: Encounter with Non Enteral Opioid Antagonist Administration Outside of Operating Room and within 12 Hrs After Opioid

a:s.a:s: define "Encounter with Non Enteral Opioid Antagonist Administration Outside of Operating Room and within 12 Hrs After Opioid": // Opioids administered before opioid antagonist AND excludes opioid antagonist administered in operating room AND limits opioid antagonist to non-enteral routes

valueset.name: Routes of Administration for Opioid Antagonists

a:s.a:s: "Encounter with Non Enteral Opioid Antagonist Administration Outside of Operating Room and within 12 Hrs After Opioid"
